sentences.en: ...a pale blue shirt with white collar and cuffs.
sentences.cn: …一件白领和白袖口的淡蓝色衬衫。

sentences.en: As soon as I get these cuff links on.
Did we ever get my suit pants fixed after the cuff came unraveled at christmas?
sentences.cn: 圣诞节我的西装袖口裂开后我们有去修过 吗 ?

sentences.en: Give me 100 dollars down and we'll put the rest on the cuff.
sentences.cn: 你先交100美元定钱,其余可以赊欠.

sentences.en: He gave the dog a cuff.
sentences.cn: 他轻轻地拍了拍那条狗。

sentences.en: He gave the pickpocket a good cuff.
sentences.cn: 他给那扒手狠狠一巴掌.

sentences.en: I have had some experience of the great Cuff's round - about ways.
sentences.cn: 我对这位神通广大的卡夫的门道也摸透了几分.

sentences.en: I'm afraid I can't answer your question off the cuff.
sentences.cn: 对不起,我不能毫无准备地回答你的问题.

sentences.en: It was a shoulder injury a Rotator cuff tear.
sentences.cn: 我的肩膀在我爬山时受伤了.

sentences.en: Miss Pao gave her a cuff, saying, " You!
sentences.cn: 鲍小姐打她一下道: “ 你!

sentences.en: Mr Baker was speaking off the cuff when he made those suggestions.
sentences.cn: 贝克先生临时提出那些建议。

sentences.en: Segeant Cuff is a perfect gentlemen.
sentences.cn: 克夫探长真是个道地的君子.

sentences.en: Sergeant Cuff and I were kept face to face.
sentences.cn: 只剩下我跟克夫探长两人面面相觑.

sentences.en: She started and looked annoyed when I mentioned that Sergeant Cuff wished to speak to her.
sentences.cn: 我一提起克夫探长想要跟她谈谈,她就吓了一跳,满脸不乐意.

sentences.en: This is not the kind of question that one can answer off the cuff.
sentences.cn: 这可不是那种可以当场答复的问题.

sentences.en: Wrap the proper - size cuff around the right arm and hold the arm level with the heart.
sentences.cn: 用大小合适的袖套带包裹右上臂,使上臂与心脏的高度相同.

words.tran_cn: 袖口，裤子翻边；手铐；一巴掌

trans.tran_cn: 袖口，护腕，裤子翻边，<俚>手铐，护腕，袖口，裤腿翻边
给…上袖口（或翻边），用手铐铐，击掌，轻拍，用手轻拍别人
